snippet: A lawsuit filed by a Redskins receiver is the latest challenge faced by FanDuel, a popular daily fantasy sports website.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins wide receiver Pierre Garcon files class-action lawsuit against daily fantasy sports website FanDuel, claiming that company profited off his name without permission; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit filed by a Redskins receiver is the latest challenge faced by FanDuel, a popular daily fantasy sports website.

headline.print_headline: In Suit, Garcon Says FanDuel Is Using His Name Without Permission
headline.main: In Suit, Pierre Garcon Says FanDuel Is Using His Name Without Permission
